name: nativescript-loading-indicator
description: A NativeScript plugin for showing an overlayed loading indicator.
author: Nathan Walker <walkerrunpdx@gmail.com>

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-loading-indicator; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: npm i; cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
